Review Text: I received 2 not 1 like everyone else. I have had no issues using it and it feels like a luxury brand. I’ve had no issues with the wax tip or breakage. I would recommend.

reference_summary:
LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools LXIANGN {} I personally love these dappen dishes!

Many complaints I’ve seen is that the lid doesn’t match the base. But as you can see from the photo, when the lid is on you can’t tell at all. I personally have no problem with them looking different when the lid is off.

The images for the product do look a lot larger then what the product actually is. I consider this a mini size. I absolutely love the size and I am glad it isn’t larger because it fits in my carry all perfectly.

It holds the liquids well and is very easy to clean. I didn’t have issues dipping my brushes into them or removing the access liquid.

I feel like these can even be used to hold all your stud earrings or something small.

Very satisfied with this product. So cute 6 Pack Hair Clips Cobahom {'Brand': 'Cobahom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} These leopard print duckbill clips are so adorable! They are a very pretty yellowish gold type metal and are very sturdy. I personally chose them because my mother loves leopard print and I plan on sending her the 3 lighter ones and I know she’ll love them.

These clips are very easy to use and add so much flare to your hair. I personally like wearing leopard print when I wear solid colors. Cute trick, leopard print goes with ANY color 😉 just don’t mix patterns and I promise it’ll be cute especially if it’s all solids !

They are very well made and I do not see these breaking anytime soon. Sorry I don’t have photos of them in my hair. So lovely! Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (4# Dark Brown) EINHOOM {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I did not like how this meshed with my brows. I’m not sure but it really did not look right. I did the upward strokes like my brow hairs but it really didn’t work well. Even when it’s overlapped like in my photo , it looks weird. I would not purchase this product nor recommend. Big nope BQAN 2 Pieces Wax Pencil for Rhinestones, Dual-ended Rhinestone Picker Dotting Tool, Wax Pen for DIY Nail Art, Rhinestone Gems Crystals Studs Picker With Pink Acrylic Handle (Pink & Pink) BQAN {'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 3.54 x 1.46 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '710050098918'} I received 2 not 1 like everyone else. I have had no issues using it and it feels like a luxury brand. I’ve had no issues with the wax tip or breakage. I would recommend. Very nice

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor aesthetically pleasing beauty accessories, expanding their interests to include brow enhancement products, enhanced nail art tools, and now dual-ended tools for rhinestone application.

- **Design Sensitivity:** A strong appreciation for cute and visually appealing designs persists, aligning with their ongoing preference for charming beauty accessories that enhance their personal style.

- **Size Consideration:** The user values practicality and portability in beauty tools, consistently favoring compact products suitable for travel.

- **Functionality:** The user demonstrates a discerning eye for product performance. Their recent positive experience with a new tool reflects a preference for high-quality, luxury-feel items that effectively meet their usability expectations. This illustrates a shift towards favorably evaluating products that perform well.

- **Versatility:** Creativity in using beauty tools for a range of applications remains evident, as they continue to seek multi-functional accessories for artistic expression and styling.

- **User Experience:** The user maintains a generally positive outlook towards beauty products but critically assesses performance and construction quality. Their recent favorable review emphasized satisfaction with product effectiveness, indicating an evolving approach to product selection.

Overall, the user is a dedicated beauty enthusiast striving for a harmonious balance between aesthetic appeal and functionality, increasingly focusing on the performance of new tools while appreciating high-quality designs.
